Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__17.4__Chanaan: : This name, which signifies traffic, is not taken here for Palestine, but for Chaldea: and the city of merchants here mentioned is Babylon.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__17.5__Of the seed of the land: : Viz., Sedecias, whom he made king.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__17.6__Towards him: : Nabuchodonosor, to whom Sedecias swore allegiance.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__17.12__Shall take away: : Or, hath taken away, etc., for all this was now done.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__17.22__Of the marrow of the high cedar: : Of the royal stock of David.-- Ibid.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__17.22__A tender twig: : Viz., Jesus Christ, whom God hath planted in mount Sion, that is, the high mountain of his church, to which all nations flow.
